review: Pros: Easy to install. Provides easy user interface and allows our family to add several additional channels (such as ESPN) to augment our bare bones cable.  We got the Fire Stick for free as a prime member during a deal week - only pay 20/month.  This was much cheaper then adding the same channels onto our cable package.Cons: Relies on WIFI - if you have disruptions in your WIFI service, obviously causes you to lose service. Overall, the stick will have to buffer a few times an hour resulting in a short outage for 10-20 seconds.  Not terrible, but a little frustrating when you are watching sports.Overall - would purchase again (for free). It is easily worth the cost of Sling TV (20/month).
